articles.title: Sushant’s Psychiatrist Quashes Claims of Breaching Confidentiality - The Quint
articles.description: Since morning, a number of media publications have claimed that Sushant Singh Rajput’s psychiatrist have given statements saying the late actor was suffering from a bipolar disorder. The doctor clarified the rumours.
